core_exploration.central_question: How can we build strategic networks to scale local initiatives nationally?
core_exploration.key_tension: Balancing individual specialized expertise with collaborative network building
core_exploration.breakthrough_moment: Recognition that connecting key supporters and practitioners creates multiplicative impact
core_exploration.edge_of_understanding: The specific mechanisms for translating local connections into national influence

conceptual_dna: Strategic network building requires identifying original supporters who can bridge initiatives
Combining policy advocacy with therapeutic practice creates powerful synergies
Connection and weaving are intentional practices that require deliberate follow-up

bridge_potential.novel_synthesis: Integrating policy advocacy with somatic therapy training for systemic change
bridge_potential.cross_domain_pattern: Network effects amplify when diverse expertise nodes are strategically connected

raw_essence: Strategic network building emerges when you identify original supporters who can bridge different initiatives and connect practitioners across domains. The key is recognizing that individual expertise becomes exponentially more powerful when woven into intentional collaborative networks.
embedding_text: network building strategic connections policy advocacy somatic therapy collaboration weaving practitioners national scaling bridge initiatives supporter connections
